Laminate and Parquet Board Installation

Laminate and parquet board installation is carried out with materials provided by the customer. We can provide consumable materials upon agreement.

Preparation of the floor for laying laminate and parquet board

  1. Preparation of the floor surface

    Before installing parquet, parquet board, or laminate, the floor surface must be level. Preparation for different types of coverings varies. However, the entire surface must be leveled in the horizontal plane. Only minor deviations are allowed.

  2. Features of laying laminate and parquet board

    Most often, the preparation of the floor for laying laminate, parquet board, or parquet takes more time than the laying itself. Laying laminate can be done by anyone who is not prepared. However, making a high-quality preparation of the floor for laying parquet board is not within the power of many. How to insulate and soundproof? And how and what to fix properly? How to sand the parquet board? What varnish to use for the finish? These questions will inevitably arise in the preparation process.

An important role in this is played by experience and knowledge of the market. This allows not only to save but also to ensure the quality of laying laminate or parquet board.

Specify the Price

The best way to determine the cost of work is to consult with our specialists for consultation and estimation. You may also find it helpful to receive advice on material selection. We provide all consultations, advice, and estimates FOR FREE

About us

Parquet works in Kyiv and the Kyiv region is our main specialization. We perform old floor covering repair with the highest quality, to the point that you won't recognize it.
